name: Momotarou Dentetsu 2010 Senkoku Ishin no Hero Daisyuugou ! No Ken
name_original: Momotarou Dentetsu 2010 Senkoku Ishin no Hero Daisyuugou ! No Ken
description: Momotarou Dentetsu 2010: Sengoku Ishin no Hero Daishuugou! no Maki is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 2009.
